document.title: Gonzales v. Raich: An Opening For Rational Drug Law Reform
document.abstract: On June 28, 2004, the Supreme Court granted review in Gonzales v. Raich, one of the California medical marijuana cases. Oral argument was heard on November 29, 2004, and a ruling is expected by June, 2005. Raich presents the Court an historic opportunity to enable sensible drug law reform at the State level.
document.publication-title: Tennessee Journal of Law and Policy

field.name: acknowledgements
field.value: Assistant Professor of Political Science, University of Tennessee, Knoxville. J.D. Ph.D. Thanks to John Scheb for his valuable feedback on this project.
